name: Project: E.N.D
description:
Submission to Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Set in a dystopian future, where science rules the world to its very core and people are categorized based on their contribution in the scientific field. Help Alice escape the facility while being surrounded by unknown dark creatures. 

This is a horror metroidvania game but our aim is to deliver an amazing short experience.

Are you ready for the challenge ahead? Will you have what it takes to reach the end of the game?

All art and audio are original and created just for this jam. Made in Unity Engine 2020

FULL SOUNDTRACKS CAN BE FOUND HERE:
